Chelsey Marie Smith: s signed affidavit in 2016 describing her witness account of Broward County elections officials filling out blank absentee ballots.
Investigation by the State Attorney: s Office in Broward County finding no evidence of criminal wrongdoing in relation to the incident.
Misreporting by Gateway Pundit and forme: who falsely claimed that election workers in Broward County had twice witnessed officials filling out blank absentee ballots.
Confirmation that the incident occurred: leading to confusion and misinformation spreading on social media.
